parse.title: Letter to Timothy J. Wheeler (10 January 1966)

links.*: Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"

wikitext.*:
On [[10 January]] [[1966]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to [[Timothy J. Wheeler]]'''. *'''Publication:''' None. A photo and transcription of the letter was posted on the web site ''[[Tolkien Library]]'', maintained by [[Pieter Collier]]. == Transcription == [[Image:wheeler_1966_letter.jpg|thumb]] {{blockquote|Dear Mr. Wheeler,

Thank you for your letter. I hope you will not think that I am ungrateful for your attention and good wishes if I say that I do not feel able to write anything such as you wish. I do wish you well, but I do not think that it would really do you much good to have special good wishes from me.

Yours sincerely,

JRR Tolkien}} ==External links== *[http://www.tolkienlibrary.com/press/Tolkien_Letters_for_sale_at_Tolkienlibrary.php Presentation of the letter on Tolkienlibrary.com] {{title}} [[Category:Letters|Wheeler, Timothy J. (1966-01-10)]]
